H0.text: where do they get the hair for a hair transplant. Arms

H2.text: where do they get the hair for a hair transplant. Chest

H3.text: where do they get the hair for a hair transplant. back

A4.text: The right candidates for this type of surgery are individuals who still have healthy hair on the sides and the back of the head in order that hair for the transplant may be harvested from those areas.
